questions.answer: Map scale is the ratio between a distance on the map and the corresponding distance on the ground.

questions.answer: Statement scale, Representative Fraction and Linear scale are types of map scales.

questions.question: What is a representative fraction?
questions.answer: Representative fraction shows the ratio between map distance and ground distance in numerical form.

questions.question: Why is linear scale important?
questions.answer: Linear scale remains accurate even if the map size changes.
